caption:
This photograph captures an aerial view of a suburban development, possibly on the outskirts of a town or city. In the foreground, there is a large, open field covered with piles of soil and scattered vegetation, suggesting recent or ongoing land development. The middle of the image is dominated by rows of brown-roofed houses; the architecture is uniform, indicating a planned community.

Further beyond the residential area, a more industrial setting appears with several larger buildings and what seems to be storage yards with numerous cylindrical objectsâ€”likely storage tanks or similar industrial containers. In the distance, you can see a wide expanse of flat land leading up to a body of water, giving the scene a coastal feel.

The backdrop features a distant view of water and a flat horizon, possibly a sea or large lake, with a faint outline of another shore or landform. Above the water, the sky is relatively clear with minimal cloud cover, suggesting a clear day. A notable feature in the distant background is what appears to be smoke or steam rising vertically, likely from a factory or power plant chimney, emphasizing the mix of residential and industrial settings in the area.

Overall, the photograph provides a comprehensive view of a community in transition from rural to more developed urban environments, underscored by the presence of both residential areas and industrial facilities.
title: Rezoning of "surplus pineapple land" enabled pineapple growers-turned-developers to build this subdivision in Mililani town, one solution to the island's housing shortage
